1.content:
Who is the reluctant princess?

Harry Rich: The best friend of John Harrison, main character from 'the witch', he is a almost 13 year old boy. Close to John , as well as his witch sisters Life is not easy living next door to such a family...

Tim Towers: Tim is a 7 year old boy, that enjoys taunting the local girls, torn between a desire to 'toughen them up' and for amusement. Has a strong mentallity of 'only I can pick on my sisters/cousins...'

Greg Dusty: Local bully, and has it in for girls in particular. Not afraid to physically harrass or do other things to his targets outside culturally acceptable norms. Targets girls mercilessly with is friend, Karl

Jacintha: A boy that has been permanently cursed into being a girl, but not in mind. She has a difficult time trying to adjust to her new life
1.title: Who is the reluctant princess?

choices: Mel got it wrong. I was dressed like Cinderella
Mel strikes again! I found myself in France. On the eve of the revolution
i woke up, but as a little girl
11.content:
"I hate that school" I muttered. "Can't you blow the pipes or something. Again."

"Its not that bad" the girl in front of me said. I had to shake my head, since she is a witch, and probably used magic to cheat her way though it. "Melanie, some of us don't have powers...."

"I didn't cheat!" she pouted.

I smiled. Mel can get so defensive at times. She is probably right; her powers are extremely unstable, even after using them for 8 months. She'd conjure up clothes for herself, and find they're boys' clothes, or she'd crave icecream, and litterally get that, ice and cream. "Yeah, you're right. You're probably conjure up a fail..."

"You're coming to the mall with me for that, miss smartmouth" she said. Its not the first time she's said that, though thanks to her unstable powers, she usually regretted it quickly. After all, I most of the time, I didn't end up as the teen girl she intended.

"Can't. Got this assignment" I said.

"Harry..."

"Life in the middle ages to early industrial revolution...." I said.

"I can help with that...." Mel giggled as she rushed off upstairs. She returned with a book in her hands. First I was afraid it was her magic book, but it was something worse. The book was tittled The reluctant princess

"No No NO!" I scremed. I had encountered that book before. Eight months ago, eml's mom showed myher son, and my best friend, John, that magic was real by first turning his clothes into fairytale princess attire, then sending him into this fairytale type world. He was given a few wishes to help him (or her) adjust, and of course she wanted help. That help was me. She the book as also being read to her princess loving little sister, Hannah, I took a liking to turn John into a Cinderella like character, both to annoy him and to lighten my own mood since I was turned into a girl too.. He'd been looking for ways to pay me back since.

"Harry, the book adjusts for the witch who reads it. Since its for me, its going to be more adult this time" Mel said seriously, as she cast her spell.

"Melanie..." I screamed, as a blacked out.
11.title: Tough school assignments and magic don't mix

choices: saw I was beginning to change
111.content:
When I woke up, I immedately saw I wasn't in my study anymore. Nor was I in a building. Clear sunlight almost blinded me as I saw I was on the coast somewhere. A beach was only twenty paces away and from what I could see, nobody else was around

Melanie I fumed, as I had another more terrifying thought. If she can teleport me somewhere, or worse, send me into that accursed book, what else could she do? Her powers made unstable seem a good thing. Quickly I placed me hands to my chest, and much to my relief, it felt as flat as always. Just to make sure, and since i didn't want anyone seeing me (I forgot nobody was around) I quickly pulled some hair from my head. It was brown, a good sign since I had discovered if someone changed me into a girl, my hair changes color to rosewood. Something to do with my genetics.

"Okay Melanie. You've had your fun. Now get me back home. I've got too much homework to play magic games" I shouted. Of course there was no answer, so after a few minutes, i walked down to the beach. Why would I end on the coast? I thought as I walked along. It gave me some time to think. She did say the book adjusts for the witch reading it, and she would know I'm pissed. Maybe she'd get Hayley to help. Hayley was her older sister and much more experienced with magic. Of course John could help, if they change him. And Hannah.... She was the youngest of the Harrison witches, and a fanatic when it came to princesses and all that girly stuff. Her favorite was Cinderella, mainly due to her shared hair color, as John found out to his misfortune, and own genetic makeup. but she knew plently of other princesses too. Then the most horrifying thought entered my mind.
The little mermaid had red hair....

Quickly I
111.title: I woke up, still normal

1112.content:
...screamed in frustration and anger because I saw I was begining to change and it was the worst one of all. Before I knew it, all my clothes began to dissolve into nothingness, leaving me completely naked. Even though nobody was in sight, I covered my manhood mainly due to reflex. Even if I was thinking, I'd have the same reaction since Mel said the story would tailor itself to the reader meant someone adolesent was reading this.

"Melanie. I'm going to kill you" I growled, wondering what to do. I knew not to dive into the water, just in case my mermaid fears were correct. While i knew this was impossible in the real world, in this world the magical restriction on keeping me fully human did not apply. Still, I couldn't stay there all day with only my hands covering me. i needed a plan. It proved irrelevent. As soon as i stood up, I felt my manhood shrink away, leaving only a feminine looking crotch. And with that change, the rest of me quickly followed. i gasped, as i felt my chest begin to itch, and my nipples spread out. within a minute, the tell tale signs of my new breasts began to appear, as they began to push out. My focus was on them, so i didn't notice my hips and ass where doing the same as my waist contracted.

"Woah. these are nearly as big as John's" i said softly, thinking of when he was turned into a princess. Now that i was turned, or mostly turned into a girl, i feel more resigned. if i was going to be a hot looking girl for a while, I was going find something enjoyable. And I knew the perfect thing. mel could be somewhat jealous, and I knew she would be somewhat put out that i had become a hotter girl than her. especially since I was hotter than the last time I found myself female. "Mel. I know you're the reading this! how do you like the fact i'm a hotter chick than you? No answer? you know what to do! Change change me back and we can forget this ever happened..." i flicked my flowing rosewood hair, to prove my point.

No answer. i knew that i was in a seriously bad situation. if I was in a fantesy world resembling my own, its best not to be a naked beauty on a beach. I'd end up pregnant before i could scream 'stop'. I looked down and screamed again.

"Crap!' I yelled, seeing that my legs had started to turn green. "crap. Crap Crap. i didn't have to be in water!" i looked around as the green discoloration crept up my legs until it hit my waist, where it stopped. that wasn't the only change, since another discoloration happened over my breasts. this time purple. 'Crap, I really am turning into her...." I moaned, just before I fainted.
1112.title: the princess of the sea

choices: shock! A beautiful witch enters, but it isn't Mel
I laugh. Two ugly servents enter
112.content:
When I woke, I saw that I was in a bedroom, suited for a girl in her mid to late teens. "Oh no..." I moaned, before seeing a mirror. Although I didn't want to look, I knew that its best to get it over with. I saw a pretty girl stare back at me.

http://www.awise.org/files/productsimage...

"Malanie Harrison!" I raged. "You turned me into a Cinderella type princess! Wait until I get my hands on you!" It is bad enough that my girlfriend turned me into a girl, sent me into a fantesy world; but I knew exactly what it means to be this type of princess. Plus I knew something from history, despite Mel''s warping of it. I immediately stormed to the vanity to get my corset (which was under my gown) off. "Damn that witch! Does she have any idea how it feels to wear that thing?" Once relieved of it, I felt better. "Okay, I'm stuck here for a while. Think Harry...." As I wondered what to do, I saw someone slowly open my door.
112.title: Melanie strikes again!

1123.content: I had to laugh, despite my situation. Two ugly girls walked in. For a moment I didn't know why, then I guessed the reason. After all, Mel did send me into some sort of fantasy world, something crossed from life from the real world middle ages and a corrupted version of Cinderella. And these two definately fit the role of 'ugly stepsister'. Neither girl seemed pleased to see me, nor did they seem comfortable wearing a bar wench style outfit. The girld were....
1123.title: I laugh. Two ugly servents enter

choices: I run with the room into an empty room
I start turning into one of those blond princesses that Hannah likes
12.content:
My name is Tim Towers and I just turned 8 a few days ago. I look just like any other kid you'd see, but I wish I could be like any other kid. The problem is that my bratty seven year old cousin, Hannah, is a witch and she is after payback; okay, the real problem is all my female relatives on my mommy's side of the family are witches. It isn't my fault that I find it funny smashing a water balloon over Hannah's, or in fact any other girl's head. Its for their own good. Its not like us boys are going to cry off to mommy if we get wet. I just wish they'd toughen up.... Hannah of course, sees it differently. She thinks I'm gross. Yeah right. She's the gross one! Anyway, haven't smashed a water balloon over her head in months, especially since she threatened to smash a balloon over my head, and concidering those freaky powers of hers.... I really don't want to be in the same room with her, even during school, but mommy told me that I'd be going to Hannah's house after school for a month.

"Mud magnet!" I taunted.

"Slime head!" Hannah retorted.

"Oatmeal brain!"

"Princess" a third voice said. I mentally groaned, since it was Hannah's best friend, a girl called Erin. She knew all about Hannah's powers, as well as all the threats against me. Plus Hannah is a princess freak, especially for any princess that is blond, like her.

"No way!" I said, wondering what I was thinking to go anywhere near her room. Surely failing art class is better than getting turned into a girl by me deranged cousin.

"She'd look cute" Erin urged, as Hannah reached for a book on her vanity. I knew what that was. It was her magic book, and something I knew she couldn't have. I ran and grabbed the book
12.title: Keeping it in the family

choices: You fall asleep and wake up as a little girl
You fall asleep and wake up as a teen girl
You fall asleep and wake up still you
13.content:
"Hey! Give that back!" the small girl in front of you whines, reaching in vain for the backpack just out of reach. You resist the urge to tug at her now loose honey blond hair.

"Nice try princess, but this is mine now" you laugh meanly.

"I can see it'll suit you" the girl says definantly, to your surprise. You frown, since you definately don't won't the 'Disney princess' backpack for yourself; you just want to make the girl squirm.

"Why would I want a cootie ridden thing like this? You girls are freaks, wanting to dress and act like that" you demand. You hear a snicker, as your best friend Karl grabs the girl. "She is right bro. We'll probably need to burn it, and a heavy dose of disinfecting"

"No! Give it back"

Karl shoves the girl -Hannah- into the mud, as you open the backpack. "Gross! Why do you have these things?" you say in disgust, as you pull out her notebook. Its pink and covered with hearts and other girlish squiggles. You toss it into the mud, next to the furious Hannah. You're about to throw the next thing into the mud as well, but on a closer look you see this item is much different. "The reluctant princess" you read. "What? This your diary, girl? Too bad, we're keeping it" you say, as Karl pushes Hannah further into the mud.

Later, you look at the book. For some reason you have felt tired since you 'borrowed' the book.
13.title: A bully gets more than he bargins for

134.content:
Stiffling a yawn, you realize that you're about to fall asleep. "Its only 5:30. Guess this is what happens when your near girls for too long" you think, climbing into bed. As you close your eyes, the book you stole from Hannah begins to glow. Too bad you don't know she is a witch. Too bad you don't know that the book you have is magical....

A couple of minutes later, you open your eyes and see that you suddenly feel refreshed. "What's wrong with me?" you wonder, as you turn abound and gasp. Your no longer in your room. Instead you're in
134.title: still you, different place

choices: two guards come in, to escort you to your trial!
A beautiful, but somewhat familiar young girl comes in with a strange offer
A beautiful girl comes in to taught you about your upcoming punishment
1342.content:
You stare in total shock, since 'your' room looks like some jail cell/dungeon, with only a small grate allowing some sunlight to filter in. A bare cold stone bed (what you just got off from) is the only thing in your room, not that the room is big to begin with; you can only take 5 paces in any direction. A heavy, barred door is the only entry/exit point from the room.

Slumping since you can see that you can't escape from the room, you wonder how this is possible. "Okay Greg..." you mutter, wondering if the cake taken from some girl had something in it. Karl warned you not to eat them..

A noise jolts you out of your thoughts, as...
1342.title: The shame, in prison and you're only 10

choices: typical attire for a fairytale princess
13421.content:
Two grim looking guard walk in, making any attempt to escape impossible. "Greg Waters?"

"Yes. Who are you? What I'm I doing here?"

The guards don't answer the questions. Instead they seize you, and half walk, half drag you out of the cell. After climbing a winding staircase, you're thrown through some doors, into what looks like a courthouse. A stern looking cloaked person, (you can't tell who it is), looks at you coldly, then asks in a voice that you can't really make out, "You've been accused of alsulting Princess Hannah. How do you plead?"

You smirk. "That cootie brained thing? Princess. Yeah, I suppose she is. Dumb girl... I just helped her by giving her a mud bath..."

"I take that as 'guilty' then."

"Whatever..." you say, wondering what is going on. You originally thought this was a dream, but a painful pinch later told you it isn't.

"Very well. You'll love this punishment then. For the next thirty days, you'll be a princess then. Failure to satisfactory meet the standards required will result in additional charges and subsequent punishments" the judge sneers. "Guards, take 'Princess Grace' away. She needs more appropiate clothes. The two guards drag you away, into an empty room, except for a single chest. you open it, hoping it has something to help you espeace this nuthouse. Instead it has
13421.title: two guards come in, to escort you to your trial!

134211.content:
"No get those cottie rags away from me" I scream, seeing what looks like typical fairytale princess clothes. You shiver at the sight of the green dress, with puffed up sleeves and gloves.

"Now Grace" a guard says. "Don't protest". That is something you're certainatly doing, pulling so hard, you almost break free of the guards grip. However there is one downside to your resistance; you clothes are getting ripped to shreads, something the guards notice.

"Grab her" one bellows, and before you know it, the other guard grabs your arm and pulls one of the gloves up your arm, past your elbow. Instantly the arm starts to tingle, and to your horror, it begins to slim down to a girlish shape.

"I'll get you for this, you girl lover" you rage, as tingling occurs on your other, now gloved as well arm. Both gurads laugh. "Maybe next time Grace, you'd behave like a princess should" as they pull the remains of your shirt off, and pushing a corset on. Instantly you feel your chest begin to tingle as
134211.title: typical attire for a fairytale princess

1342112.content:
Instantly you felt your chest begin to tingle as it rose slightly and you felt the weight of small but definite breasts under the corset as the guards tightened it into place. A short scream escaped your lips as the air was literally squeezed out of your lungs by the tightening corset, giving you an hourglass figure. "Now for your dress... princess." said the guard, motioning to a grinning girl approaching you with a long pink princess cut dress.

"No!" you screamed with what breath you had. "No! I don't want to be a princess!"

"Too late for that!" said the unidentified girl, pulling the dress over your head. "Take your punishment and maybe you'll learn something from it!"

Tears rolled down your quickly softening face as the back of the dress was zipped closed to the collar and the sash was tightly tied in the back, sealing you inside it. Your cries became more high pitched, making you cry more as you felt the rest of your body tingling. You dared not to think of what was happening between your legs as something felt missing there as the girl then took a tissue and dabbed at your tears. "Now, now, you are a princess." she said. "Let's see you smile."

"Is she kidding!?" you thought, angered. "What is there to smile about!?"

You continued to cry, causing the girl to sigh. "I said... smile."

Just then, you felt your mouth beginning to curve into a grin and, though you tried to fight it, a bright smile formed onto your face as the unidentified girl giggled. "That's better." she said with an evil smile. "We'll make you a girly girl in no time and you can start your new life on the right foot."

You tried to protest but nothing would come out but giggling. "Noooooo!!!!"

Inside the real world, Hannah's best friend, Erin, giggled. "That's a great story so far, Hannah." she said after listening to Hannah read it. "Greg makes a lovely princess." she pointed to the strangely accurate picture of a terrified girl in a princess dress, being held by two guards. "What happens next?"

Hannah grinned. "That's up to our 'reluctant princess'." she replied. "I'll read the next chapter tomorrow during lunch, same as today."

"I can't wait." said Bree, another of Hannah's friends. "I hope Greg becomes a girly girl."

"Nah, I hope 'she' learns her lesson and comes out a noble prince." said Amy, a short red headed girl. "Greg is not exactly 'princess' material."

Hannah laughed, knowing that you were going through this for real due to a protective spell around the book. "Time will tell the tale, girls." she said. "I'll see you all in class."
1342112.title: What hapens next?

13421121.content:
You look at the girl who is tormenting you, though she is no longer 'controling you' or whatever she did to make you smile and giggle. You open your mouth, and you're pleased to hear what you intend to say come out of your mouth. "What the fuck did you do to me?"

The girl frowns. "That is no language a pretty princess like you should use. They should be graceful, polite, girly, not course like that! That is an additional day to your sentence, Grace.

"No!" you scream. "Don't leave me as this cootie brained thing"

"I should add another day for that insult, but since you're insulting yourself...." the girl grins. "I'm leaving for a while. Oh, and you should curtsey"

What?! as you feel yourself begin to curtsey. Nooooo!
13421121.title: That is no way a princess should talk

13423.content:
You turned to the sound of a girl giggling and saw the face of a beautiful girl around your age, wearing make up and a strong scent of a sweet perfume. "You're going to be a handmaiden... You're going to be a handmaiden..." she taunted, giggling.

"Cut that out!" you demanded, angrily. "Get me out of this room you cootie infested girl!"

The girl responded with a sweet laugh that quickly turned to something more evil sounding. "The queen was not impressed by your actions this morning." she said teasingly. "Your punishment is to please me for thirty days as my handmaiden."

"Don't hold your breath, princess." you said, defiantly. "Once that door is open, I'm out of here!"

The girl laughed again. "You could do that, if you want to remain a girl for the rest of your life." she said. "The formula was forced down your throat while you were asleep. you'll start changing any minute now, I'm here to watch."

You winced, feeling something moving inside of you then screamed as you saw your hands starting to change, becoming smaller, more slender. "Okay, okay!" you said, alarmed. "What do I have to do to get you to change me back!?"

The girl smiled wickedly through the bars. "Simple, make me happy for thirty days." she replied. "There is, of course, a catch to this deal."

"Oh of course there is!" you said, seeing your arms becoming more slender as well. "What is it?"

"There are only three antidotes to the potion that is now changing you." said the girl, grinning madly. "Three strikes, you are out, back to where you came from... a girl forever!"

You gulped at as you felt yourself shrinking slightly and saw that your clothing was starting to change as well. "So, all I have to do is keep you happy for thirty days and I'll go back a boy again?" you asked, confirming the deal.

"That's it... Grace." said the girl. "By the way, I am princess Brooke. Pleased to make your acquaintance."

You turned to the girl and found that she did indeed look a lot like your little sister Brooke. What do you do...?
13423.title: A beautiful girl comes in to taught you about y...

134231.content:
"Get away from me, you cootie brained cretin!" you yell, seeing your clothes start to shift to a plain green dress with a leather corst around the outside. The only good thing about the outfit it is hiding the changes that's happening to you. Fortunately since you're only ten, you don't get much growth in your breast or hips.

"Not very smart, are you Gracie?" the princess giggles. "You have much to learn." She takes a small vial of black liquid out of a fold of her dress, and holds in near your horrified face. "Oops" she smiles, as she drops it. You dive for it, but you're too slow; it shatters on the stone floor of the cell.

"Two more antidotes, Grace. Still if you fail, you'd still make a great handmaiden. Those outbursts of yours is funny coming from a pretty girl such as yourself" she smiles. You're hyperventilating, and wonder why you're having this nightmare. "I'll give you hour to get used to your new self, then I expect you to be in my chambers. I have a ball tonight."

You can only look as princess Brooke walks out, grinning madly.
134231.title: Throw a fit (strike one.)

just embress her at the ball

If this Brooke thinks she can scare you into being some shy, cootie infested girl, she can think again. "I'm Greg Waters. No stupid girl will beat me" you think , before a sly grin forms on your face. THe Brooke has the antidotes in her room, giving you the perfect opportunately to steal them. "Stupid girl" you think, before thinking of a backup plan. You don't want to be caught, so maybe wait on the theft. "Yes, better idea, Greg. Embrass her.... What would a cootie tower like? The ball... and these things like getting dressed up... Hmm interesting."

Quickly you looki down and you almost screamed in shock and fear. "I i'm older...." you stammered, seeing that you look like you're 16 or 17. Quickly, you sit on the bed, just to steady yourself. The woman looked at you and said
1343.title: a tavern, near a forest

Plus you didn't even consider that its slightly unwise to insult the person that you're hoping to get you drinks. She glared at you and said, "The quest to save Princess Grace Here.." she passed to you some sort of parchment. You don't spend much time looking at it. Girl similar to your new age that lost her way and got lost. Typical really..... Big reward for her return. All that standard stuff. You look at the woman, not really interested. you mused So what? Or are you just some mean drunk?"

You look at the wench, and for the first time in your life, you actually feel afraid of a girl. There is something creepy about her, something about her eyes that tells you that you'd better get out of this tavern, or whatever you've found yourself in. "Of course I'm going to save this princess" you said. "But I'm unsure what I'm going to face, so of course I'm surly, so cut me some fucking slack, okay." What do you do?

That woman has really creeped you out. May as well rescue this dumb, brainless thing. I hope the reward will be worth it you thought, as you looked at the tavern notice board. There it is, The notice to rescue Princess Dopey. You tear it off, and place it inside your armor. Nobody is stealing my gold....

In the real world, three pairs of eyes read the story. "He's actually going to rescue the princess?" Hannah said amazed.

"But he''s only interested in gold. That won't end well for him" a second girl said. Its Hannah's second oldest sister, Melanie. A powerful, but unstable witch. She found out that Hannah had the book in her bag when she came home, looking roughed up, and slightly worried. They went immedately to their eldest sister, Hayley.

13431111.content:
Why they have such a big reward for an easy task you wondered as you stood at the entrance to the tower wherew the princess is kept. No moat, no guardian of some sort, and not even a lock on the door. You push open the door, and laugh. If they want to give me my money that easily, I'd take it. Typical dumb girl. As she'd need to do is push open the door you sneered. Instantly, your heart sinks as you see a long spiraling staircase. "I hate stairs" you mutter as you start your climb. Thirty minutes later, you're at the top, panting, but still sneering. Stupid girls. Going down is easier than coming up. But of course a brainless thing like them wouldn't even think of it

Looking around, you see the tower's top consists of several rooms, all hidden behind heavy oak doors. Opening a door, you see it must be ickhead's bedroom. You stiffle a yawn. as much as you hate to admit it, climbingseveral hundred stairs has taken it out of you, even with your older body. Should have taken off the armor. Not like i needed it you thought as you eyed the bed. Surely a small rest can't help...

Where is this thing? Don't tell me that she grew a brain, and learnt to climb down stairs you thought furiously, as you checked room after room. You begin to smirk as you see a blond haired girl in the room. She must be about your new age, 16 or 17, and for some wierd reason, you think of her as Hannah, or what you imagine the little freakshow brat would be if she was older. Maybe because she was wearing a flowing green gown like a stereotypical fairytail princess. She had to be one of the most beautiful girls you're seen, but you don't care about that. To you, she means money. Lots of money.

"You must be the princess I had to get out of here" you said.

"Yes. My name is...."

"Never mind. We have to get out of here" you interupted rudely, grabbing her gloved hand. While you already know the answer, that she is too brainless like any other female, you know how to use the stairs, you have to ask. "Why didn't you just escape?"

"Because I've got a curse on me" the princess said. 'The name's Millie by the way."

Curse. Yeah right. Its all your imagination, you cretin. Quickly, and over her protests, you haul her onto your right shoulder, and start climbing down the stairs.
1343111111.title: The rescue

134312.content:
"Just give me my beer!" you shout. The woman nodded, and returned a couple of minutes later with a mug full of a lightly colored beer. If you really was 16 or 17, you'd know that there isn't quite right with the color of the booze. And if you had any response towards women, you'd know there isn't something quite right about the bar wench's reactions either. you quick grab the mug and start drinking.


"What are you so happy about?" you sneer, as you see the woman smile broadly.

"Just the whole princess issue. I think we may have found her."

"What to yoou mean?' you said, starting to slur your words.

"The princess has been missing for a year, so we've considered that we need to find a replacement. And a nasty, mean drunk like you would be perfect."

"Yous crazy... Wat happed to mez...Iz not drunk... Youz bitch..." you said, as you lunge for the woman, as you realized the beer was drugged. She stepped back, and smirked herself, as you fell back asleep. Smiling, she knocked on the door of another room, alerting to guards.

"I've got what you wanted. One failure of a knight, and he's a pig, drunk, and jerk as well. I think he'd fit his new role 'nicely'."

One of the knights laughed. "Yes.... Our soon to be princess will fit in well."
134312.title: bad beer

choices: Skip a few weeks; mom sends me away
Skip a few weeks; mom is not pleased with my 'progess'
14.content:
My name is Jack Bowers, or least it was until the incident. Until then, I was a typical 11 year old boy, living with my mom and brother Paul. Least until one morning...

"Wake up Jacintha" I heard mom call to me one morning.

"Huh" I thought, my mind still addled with sleep. "Did she call Jacintha?" I decided to get up anyway, even though I felt weird, like if something had changed about me. Then I put it down to tiredness, so I walked over to a mirror in my bedroom. I know, its not typical for a guy to have that in his room, but mom insisted a few months earlier. SHe's been acting weird since.

I looked in the mirror and got the shock of my life; a 11 year old girl was standing where I'm supposed to be. Instantly a feminine scream escaped my lips, and it wasn't long before mom stepped into my doorway, looking pleased with herself.

"Mmmm mom. What happened to me?" I stammered, seeing she was not surprised to see me like this.

"I'm a witch Jacintha, and I turned you into a girl"

"Why? change me back. How long will I have to be like this?"

"This is you. You're a girl now. For life. And you're going to be a witch. Just like me."
14.title: Jacintha's story

141.content:
I turned to my mom, furious that she would do such a thing to me. "First, this not who I am, I'm a boy and you changed me into a girl!" I screamed, fuming. "Second, you have no right to do that to me, its abuse! Third, I do not want to be a witch if magic is all about forcing others to be who they are not!"

I breathed heavily, my anger mostly spent as mom looked at me patiently. "First, the change is permanent, I can not change you back, even if I wanted to." she said, softly. "Second, as queen of this land, I have every right and making you the future queen ruler of this land is hardly abuse. Third, boys can not work magic, only girls can. That said, you now have the power to protect your little brother, once you learn magic... my princess."

I took a step back, alarmed and confused. "Since when did you become the queen of anything?" I asked, worried about mom's mental state. Sure, changing me into a girl proved that she was a witch but queen!? "Also, what do you mean by calling me 'little princess'?"

Mom giggled and pointed out the window. Curious, I peered out and nearly screamed as my once two story house in the suburbs had somehow become a massive castle in a valley somewhere I didn't recognize. Shaken, I turned back to mom. "What!?... How!?... Why!?..."

My voice was becoming more and more high pitched with my panic as mom gently took me into her arms as I then began to sob on her shoulder. "There, there, my princess." she cooed. "Let it all out. Your girl training will begin once your tears go dry."

It was a long while before my tears dried up and mom immediately began my 'girl training.' Unknown to me, I was inside a story book with mom reading the story as it progressed to her design. Standing next to the desk where mom was reading was Elvira Strange, the head witch who seemed very unhappy.

"You do realize that, if a daughter emerges from that book in one month's time, you would have permanently changed your son's gender by force." said Elvira. "That is highly frowned upon under witch law."

"I realize the risks involved, madam head witch." said mom, softly. "It's my responsibility, either way."

Elvira drew in close, causing mom to shiver with fright. "I just hope the risk you are taking with your son's life is worth the reward you are seeking." she said, whispering, before vanishing from the room.

Mom swallowed hard then turned back to the book to see that your first girl lesson was in....
141.title: Girl training

15.content:
Who else could be the victim/heroine of this enchanted fairytale?

Karl Dusty: A known bully who targets girls in particular. Not afraid to physically harass or do other things to his targets to the point of cruelty. Targets girls mercilessly with his friend, Greg Waters.

Mike Cutie: Hannah's best friend since Kindergarten. Girls have been known to call him 'My cutie'. Shy around everyone but Hannah, he has a big crush on her and will go out of his way to help her, which can lead him into trouble....

Paul Moon: A kind seven year old boy, twin to Tina Moon who had just discovered her magical powers and a fairytale book, you can guess what happens next.... (MOMMY!!)

Jack Strange: John Harrison's uncle. A powerfully built man in his early fifties with a family of his own. His former rogue witch wife, Sarah Strange feels playful one night and pulls out a children's book. Jack now has a 'small girl' problem...

Which character do you choose?
15.title: someone else

choices: A girl in a luxurious bedroom.
Still you, in a strange place.
At school, sinking into the book!
152.content:
You were just arriving at school, hearing the usual joke from the girls, "Hey, my cutie!" before they ran off, giggling. It was what made their day or at least that was how you looked at it. You pushed your longish sand brown hair to the side, revealing your gentle brown eyes and smiled, seeing Hannah Harrison not too far ahead. "Maybe I can talk to her a little before class." you whispered to yourself. "That would would start my day right."

Only, before you could get close, Greg Waters jumped in front of Hannah, grabbing her book bag. "What'cha got in the cootie bag, princess?" he asked, meanly. "Mind if I look?"

"Hey, give that back!" whined Hannah, vainly jumping up to grab her book bag. "It's mine!"

"Nice try, weed breath!" laughed Greg. "It's mine now!"

"I didn't know you liked girly things." Hannah said, defiantly.

You giggled at that as you came closer, seeing it was a Disney princess book bag. Only Greg heard you as his friend, Karl Dusty jumped in your path. "Let's keep this between them, shall we?" he asked, coldly.

Your eyes narrowed as you really wanted to help. "Out of the way, Dusty!" you demanded.

"Oh ho!" said Karl, smiling. "The cootie boy wants to play with the big dogs." he then frowned. "you should have kept your cootie ass on the porch!"


He swung a fist, which you dodged then ran passed him as Greg pushed Hannah into the mud. "That suits you!" he said. "A lot of mud to wash away the cooties!"

"Leave her alone, Waters!" you yelled. "Give her back her book bag!"

Greg ignored you as Karl took you from behind and tossed you into another mud puddle. "You like girls so much, we might as well treat you like one!" he hissed, angry that you had slipped passed him. you got up as Greg tossed Hannah's heart and kiss themed notebook into the mud next to her.

"We got two girls for the price of one today, bro." he said to Karl. "It must be our lucky day."

With that, he pulled out the second item from Hannah's bag. "The reluctant princess?" he asked, reading the title. "if that isn't the most girlish title..."

"No!" screamed Hannah, tearfully. "Give it back!"

Greg pushed a furious Hannah back into the mud, causing her to cry, before he threw it at you. Seeing it coming, you jumped up, pushing Karl over in the process and began to run backwards. "I got it!" you yelled. "I got it!"

Hannah gasped, seeing the book fly right into your arms. "Mike, NO!!" she screamed.

Only it was too late. You had jumped onto a bench to catch the book but missed. It landed at your feet then somehow slid under them so that you were standing on the pages, just before you blacked out.

You woke up in what seemed like hours later and found yourself...
152.title: Mike Cutie.

choices: You don't answer the queen decides for you.
1522.content:
You found yourself inside a what looked like a throne room from a fairytale, facing a tall elaborately dressed woman and three similarly dressed girls who reminded you of Hannah and her family, minus John. You tried to speak but your found yourself unable to do so as you also discovered that you can not move.

"What are we to do with this one, my queen?" asked the eldest daughter. "He is noble, through and through, and was brought hither in all innocence."

"Alas, we must test him, as we do all others who enter here." replied the queen. "Only I am at a loss as to how."

"Perhaps we can see how well he presents himself as a princess." suggested the second eldest. "It will earn him passage back to whence he came."

"It may also unfairly seal his fate as a young maiden." replied the queen.

"I say we ask him." said the youngest, dressed more elaborately than the other two sisters. "there is no harm is hearing his opinion in this matter."

The queen nodded and waved her hand. "Speak, young man." she demanded gently. "What say you of this?"

"I... I'm afraid you have me at a disadvantage." you said, shaken. "A while ago, I was trying to catch Hannah's book so it would not get ruined." you then bowed your head, tearing up. "I missed and the book somehow slid under my feet, making the pages muddy." you began to cry. "I'm sorry..."

The queen smiled, her eyes twinkling. "I believe I now know what to do with this one." she said. "Face me, young man."

Trembling, you looked into the queen's eyes. "Yes... um... your highnesses?" you asked.

The queen giggled. "You have a kind heart but little knowledge of girls." she said.

"Well, yeah, I'm a boy." you replied. "All girls are a mystery to me." you then gave a dreamy smile. "That's I like them."

The girls giggled, blushing slightly as the queen giggled as well. "How would you like solve some of that mystery?" she asked you. "Live the life of a princess for thirty days and see, first hand, what how we girls live."

You looked at the queen, curious and frightened at the same time. "You can do that?" you asked. "How?"

The queen laughed. "How do you believe you found yourself inside a fairytale?" she countered. "Anything is possible."

"What... what about Hannah?" you asked. "She's still being bullied by Greg Waters and Karl Dusty."

The queen waved her hand, opening a window in the wall where you saw John Harrison, Hannah's older brother, and his friend Harry Rich angrily chasing the two bullies off with Hannah's older sisters comforting her. "Hannah is in good hands, Mike Cutie." said the queen, closing the window. "What do you say to my offer?"
1522.title: Still you, in a strange place.

choices: Mom punishes Hannah and the bullies.
15222.content:
You teared up, not wanting to hurt anyone's feelings. "Please don't take this the wrong way, I'm sure you're all very nice." you said. "But.... I just want to go home."

The queen sighed, hoping to have sparked your curiosity. "I am afraid that is impossible at this time, Mike Cutie." she said sadly. "You see, inside this story, you must meet three requirements in order to leave. I was hoping to entice you into one of those requirements to make your stay here more comfortable."

"Anything is possible, err, my queen." you said, frustrated but still polite. "You said it yourself."

"Yes, I said this." replied the queen, patiently. "I can send you back but, because you will be sent back early, without meeting any of the three requirements, you will become a girl for the rest of your life."

You gulped. "What kind of book did Hannah bring to school?"

Unknown to you, as the queen and her daughters carefully explained the truth, Hannah was having troubles of her own in the real world at school...

"Are you okay, Hannah?" asked Erin, one of Hannah's best friends.

Erin was a kind, lightly built seven year old girl with light brown hair and gentle green eyes. She and Hannah had been best friends with you since Kindergarten. Hannah turned to her, holding the reluctant princess story with a distraught look on her face as she cried.

"Erin, I made a terrible mistake!" she said. "Mike Cutie, he's inside the book!"

Erin looked at Hannah, confused. "Inside... the book?" she asked. "What are you talking about?"

Then, Hayley, Hannah's eldest sister, waved her hand and Erin walked away as if nothing had taken place before Hayley then grabbed the book from her grasp. "You brought this book to school!?" she asked, stunned and angered. "Are you completely out of your mind!?"

"I'm sorry, Hayley!" bawled Hannah, covering her face with her soiled hands. "Just help me get Mike out!"

Hayley paled considerably before turning red as she pried one hand away from Hannah's face. "Mike Cutie!?" she asked, quietly but enraged. "You put your best friend into the book!?"

"No!" whispered Hannah, distraught. "It was an accident!"

She then went on to quietly explain what had happened to which Hayley gave Hannah's wrist a turn, forcing her to wince from the pain. "Mom is not going to be happy, Hannah!" she hissed. "Especially since we all now must skip school for the day to clean up your mess!"

With that, she gave John and Harry a nod who dragged a struggling Karl and Greg along with them as they all walked away from the school as the first bell rang....

Back to you, inside the book, the queen and her daughters had finished explaining, leaving you pale with fright but also a quiver with curiosity. "My neighbors are witches and I am inside the pages of an enchanted book, designed to test a boy's resolve by making him a princess?" you asked.

"That is correct, Mike Cutie." replied the queen. "However, you were brought here by accident but must still be tested or leave here forever a girl, that is the conditions of the enchantment."

"What are the three conditions?" you asked, more shaken than curious.

The queen sighed. "One, learn what life is like as a girl by living a month here as my fourth daughter, that is the easiest of the three as you will return home yourself after that time." she replied. "Two, serve my daughters, hand and foot, as a handmaiden...not an easy task. Failure to please them will result in you being a girl forever."

"Then, what is the third condition?" you asked, hopeful.

"The third condition is the hardest, solve the mystery of the reluctant princess." explained the queen. "One of my daughters will go missing, you have to will take her place and try to solve who had kidnapped her and why." she then gave you a sad look. "If you fail to solve the mystery within thirty days, you will return home a girl in body and mind forever, Mike Cutie will die and Michelle Cutie will take his place...."

"You must chose quickly." added the eldest daughter. "If not, we will be forced to chose for you."

You could feel your heart pounding in your throat as the queen and the three princesses waited for your answer.
15222.title: You ask to go home.

choices: Girl versions of Karl and Greg.
152221.content:
So, Ms H and her daughters are all witches?" you asked, stunned. It seemed impossible but, considering the situation you were in, it had to be the truth. you were trapped inside a magic book. "Can't I be a prince charming or something?"

The girls giggled as their mother smiled. "Nice try, young man." she said. "The magic story does not work that way, you must chose one of the three requirements."

With a heavy sigh, you made your decision. "I guess it won't hurt to be your fourth daughter... for a while." you said. "I will get out of this a boy, right?"

"Hopefully, but the story has only just started." replied the queen. "You must gain an understanding of girls to escape your fate as one but do not fear, you will have help from us and from an ironic source."

"By the way, I'm Kayley." said the eldest daughter.

"I'm Millie." said the second eldest daughter.

"I'm Shannah." said the youngest daughter.

"You will simply call me mum." said the queen, smiling. "We will help you learn the ways of a princess and, in the process, learn to understand girls better." she then waved her hand, casting a spell.

"I feel weird." you said.

You looked down and screamed as you saw yourself shrinking to girl proportions with your clothing changing at the same time to hide the obvious changes underneath. Fortunately, being only seven, your chest remained flat but you could feel something pulling at your boyhood as it quickly formed into girlhood. You winced, felling your insides shifting as your new reproductive organs took shape, not that you understood that was what was happening. Within seconds, the changes were complete and you turned to a mirror to find a pretty girl in a pink princess dress where you once stood. You reacted with a short scream as mum smiled at you.

"Welcome to the family... Michelle." she said. "You will find our handmaidens waiting for you in your bedroom."

"Handmaidens?" you asked, confused.

Kayley giggled. "Personal servants." she said. "They will be helping you get dressed in the morning, serve you your food, help with your make up, and so on."

"I see..." you said, still unnerved by your new voice. "Are these handmaidens the ironic help you mentioned?"

Mum smiled as Kayley took you by the hand and lead you through a number of halls to what you guessed was your bed room where you found...
152221.title: You make your choice.

choices: an order from the 'council of queens'
Karla says, "Forget it, will serve this 'Shelley'"
1522211.content:
"What is going on here?" you say aloud seeing two almost familar girls, even though they're both about 15. One is in a simple serving wench type outfit, while the other is in a typical french maid outfit. Both looking extremely unhappy and keep tugging at some sort of pentant around their necks.

"Morning girls" queen mum says. "My, haven't you two been busy".

""Change us back, you witch" the wench says, as the pendant she is wearing glows slightly. You gasp since her breasts have slightly grown. Mum chuckles.

"Since its partly they're fault, you're my daughter, Michelle, I thought Gina and Karla should help you. However they haven't exactly been co operative, hence the pendants. If they don't stop soon, they won't be your handmaidens anymore, they're be regular maidans. For real.

"You can't do this to us" 'Gina' protests.

Queen mom sighs and pulls out a bit of parchment. She reads...
1522211.title: Girl versions of Karl and Greg.

15222112.content:
Karla turned pale as mum cleared her throat, then said, "Forget it, we'll serve this Shelly. You don't have to read that to us again... queen Natalia."

Mum smiled. "I'm so glad you two finally see reason." she said. "Behave yourselves and you might get out of this, still boys but better off for the experience."

"Don't hold your breath." muttered Gina, wearing the maid's uniform.

"I'm sorry, Gina?" asked mum, still smiling. "Did you have something to say?"

"No, my queen." replied Gina, softly. "I shall return to my... duties."

With that, she left the room, leaving Karla with you. "I will get princess Michelle ready for midday meal, your highness." she said. "It should not take long."

"Be certain to do it right, servant Karla ." said mom. "My daughters expect Michelle to look her best."

She then left the room as Karla turned angrily towards you. "Okay, you little rug rat." she whispered. "I'm to serve you hand and foot to get out of this nightmare." she sneered. "The second we're out of here, though, there is going to be a major role reversal, you get me!"

You swallowed hard but not from Karla's threat. You saw the pendant glowing. "Um... I wouldn't say such things with that pendant still around your neck." you warned.

Karla looked at the pendant and screamed as she saw her breasts grow slightly more. "Curse this thing!" she snapped. she screamed again as she felt her hair kiss her shoulders.

"I'd just play along if you don't want to leave this a girl for life." you said. "I was given a choice as to what role to play, not that I wanted to play any of them." you winced, not wanting to hurt anyone, hen added, "Queen mum told me that, if I did not chose, she'd have to chose for me."

Karla was silent for a moment. "So, we're all trapped in here, so to speak." she said. "Maybe together, we can find a way out this crazy storybook and hide it so no one else will get trapped."

"I don't know, I sort of have to behave too." you said. "Otherwise, my fate will be the same as yours, a girl for life." you shuddered at the thought. "I like girls but I really don't want to be one forever, its not worth the risk."
15222112.title: Karla says, "Forget it, will serve this ...

choices: She guides you to the hall. Gina is waiting for you
She tells you, and you get lost
152221122.content:
"Forget it" Karla says, to your relief. You don't know what exactly is around her neck, but you suspect it is something that turns her more girl like every time she does something unladylike. "So what do you want to wear?" she asks. You try to hide your smile; it must be killing her not to snarl, or throw an insult at you, or any girl. "Anything that isn't too frilly, or revealing" you say. You look over and watch her walk to the wardrobe.

"Princess, I don't think anything here is your style" Karla says. She picks up one dress and says, "Too puffy", followed by "Too pink", then "Too girly" You sigh, she is terrified of that thing around her neck. "I need to look my best. Remember who's book this is."

"That little witch" Karla says. Neither she or yourself notice the pendant glow slightly, but the only change is a slight lengthening of her hair. "I just need to look 'my best'"

"I've got just the thing" Karla says, passing you a gown that fits all three of her earlier complants. You frown, increasing as Karla asks, "Do I have to dress you, princess Shelly?"

You don't like that thought. "No, I can manage" you say, as you grit your teeth, remove your clothes, and slide the dress onto your body. Eventually, you have to call Karla back to tie you up in it. "Will you require any further assistance?"

"No. Just tell me where I'm to take my midday meal"
152221122.title: Karla drops the subject.

choices: Tell all, you have nothing to hide.
1522211221.content:
Although Karla clearly hates what she must do, she gently guides you by the hand down several halls to a grand dinning hall where mum and your new sisters were waiting with Gina standing by an empty seat you presumed was meant for you. "Good day, princess." said Gina with some reluctance. "Your meal is ready for you, please enjoy."

Having seen Hannah sit down, wearing a dress many times, you managed to sit properly at the table as Gina pushed your chair in and began to serve your meal, a hearty plate of pancakes with butter and syrup. You grinned as it was your favorite thing to have for lunch and looked at the table for a fork before Kayley cleared her throat. "You must first place your napkin onto your lap so the dress does not get dirty." she said.

You took up your napkin and carefully placed it onto your lap. "So that's why Hannah does that during lunch at school." you thought. "Very clever."

"Eat slowly and politely." instructed mum, kindly. "Remember, this is a test for you as well as Karla and Gina."

You nodded and proceeded to politely enjoy your meal, using a second napkin to wipe your mouth every now and then as mum started a conversation. "Tell me, Michelle, what is your life on the outside like?"

"I'm sorry." you said, confused. "What exactly do you mean?"

Madeline giggled. "We'd like to know more about you." she said, not revealing it was part of the test. "How much are you willing to reveal to us?"

What do you do?
1522211221.title: She guides you to the hall. Gina is waiting for...

15222112211.content:
You shrugged. "There really isn't much to tell, I'm only seven." you said. "I live alone with my nanny in a house behind the Harrison's who are really nice." you blushed. "I really like Hannah."

Kayley smiled. "What does your mom and dad do for a living?" she asked.

"I'm not sure." you replied, a sad look forming on your face. "They are always away, I get a phone call from them on my birthday and on Christmas but they haven't been home since I turned five."

"I see..." said mum, softly. "What is your nanny like?"

"Oh, she's really nice." you said, a smile returning. "She has a few strange rules but I don't mind."

"What sort of rules?" asked Madeline, curious.

"She doesn't like me in her room for any reason." you replied, simply. "I'm okay with it, I mean, its her room. Also, she does not want me in the attic." you giggled. "She said there are 'curious' things in there I would not like."

Mum smiled but said nothing as Shannah asked, "What makes you like this Hannah so much?"

You blushed brightly and replied, "Everything..."

Mum and the girls giggled then finished enjoying their meal while Karla and Gina reluctantly worked around them, refilling their drinks and filling their plates with more food.

Later on, mum summoned you to her chambers. "Did I do something wrong... mum?" you asked, nervous.

Mum smiled gently. "No, my dear, you have been a perfect angel." she replied. "I came here to ask you if you have ever seen this."

She then produced....
15222112211.title: Tell all, you have nothing to hide.

152221122111.content:
She showed you a magic book to which you shook your head. "Sorry, no." you replied. "I have never seen a book like this before." you turned to mum worried. "Is one missing?"

Mum smiled. "No, I was merely asking to see how much you know." she replied. "You need not know more than that."

"Um... okay." you said, confused. "What am I to do now?"

Mum smiled. "Go find your sisters, they have some fun in store for you."

You sighed, guessing what that 'fun' might be then smiled. "Okay."

With that, you walked out the door as Mum watched you leave, smiling.
152221122111.title: a magic book.

1522211221111.content:
You walked through the halls, surprisingly finding them more familiar, to meet your sisters in a grand courtyard. Kayley smiled seeing you approach. "Welcome, Michelle." she said, giving you a hug. "We want to show you how to ball room dance for the upcoming ball."

"Did you say... dance?" you asked, nervous. "I- I have two left feet and they quiver when I dance with a girl."

Your sisters giggled. "You are a girl here, Michelle." reminded Melody. "You will be dancing with one of us." she then grinned. "Unless you wish to dance with Gina or Karla."

You quickly shook your head. "If you please, I'll dance with one of you."

Again, your sisters giggled. "Who will it be then?" asked Shannah. "Melody or myself?"

You smiled. "I'll dance with you, Shannah." you said.

Shannah smiled then offered her hand, which you took. Only, as you did, your clothing transformed into...
1522211221111.title: fun with your sisters.

155.content:
Kim Cole a 12 year old boy who is always confused for a girl his name isnt helping him either.

Ethan Carter a 30 year old lawyer who pissed of a witch
155.title: Make a custom character.

1553.content:
jack wanderson a 16 year old otoku

nicky wanderson the 13 year old little brother of jack
he thinks boy are beter than girls
1553.title: other

15533.content:
Ranma Saotome
from the anime Ranma 1/2
http://ranma.wikia.com/wiki/Ranma_Saotom...
15533.title: more guys

info.brief_description: A witch's book can lead to interesting reading
info.description:
Books are harmless ways to pass the time, right? Wrong. One day you're stucked into a book. Unfortunately for you, its the reluctant princess, a story where a young boy is forced to fill in for a kingdom's much loved princess.

The storyline is inspired by the thread and book mentionod of the same name in 'the witch', created by scifiwizard and myself
